comment: Six Children in Minnesota Diagnosed with Rare "Polio-Like" Disease Since September.There are only5 countries where polio has seen a comeback, Nigeria, Pakistan, Afghanistan, KenyaandSomalia
amr:
# ::snt Six Children in Minnesota Diagnosed with Rare "Polio-Like" Disease Since September.There are only5 countries where polio has seen a comeback, Nigeria, Pakistan, Afghanistan, KenyaandSomalia
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / diagnose-01
            :ARG1 (c / child
                  :quant 6
                  :location (s / state
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Minnesota")))
            :ARG2 (d2 / disease
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Polio-Like")
                  :ARG1-of (r / rare-02))
            :time (s2 / since
                  :op1 (d3 / date-entity
                        :month 9)))
      :snt2 (c2 / country
            :quant 5
            :mod (o / only)
            :location-of (s3 / see-01
                  :ARG0 (p / polio)
                  :ARG1 (c3 / comeback-01
                        :ARG1 p))
            :example (a / and
                  :op1 (c4 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Nigeria"))
                  :op2 (c5 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Pakistan"))
                  :op3 (c6 / country
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                  :op4 (c7 / country
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Kenya"))
                  :op5 (c8 / country
                        :name (n7 / name
                              :op1 "Somalia")))))
